title: It's a Date
description: Someone bit off more than she can chew…Food blogger Eliza is perfectly happy with her life.She’s independent, doing what she loves for a living, and all she needs to produce quality videos is peace and quiet. Both are interrupted by, one, the ongoing heat wave that’s tearing at her nerves, and two, the new neighbour moving in across the hall on a leisurely weekday afternoon. Loudly.All single dad Cole wants is a fresh start for himself and his young daughter, or so he claims. Eliza is intrigued, but the closer they become, the more disturbing Eliza’s daily life suddenly is.Cole’s secrets could easily endanger her livelihood - and her life.
author: Camille Dwight
